meanings.definition: A type of fish with long, threadlike rays on its fins.
meanings.sent1: The threadfin swam gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often catch threadfin for their delicate flavor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the threadfin bring a spool of thread to the ocean? To sew up any fishy business!
meanings.sent4: The threadfin's fins shimmered like delicate threads in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch the threadfin darting in and out of the coral reefs.

meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The threadfin population has been thriving in the coastal waters.
meanings.sent2: Local restaurants serve delicious dishes made with fresh threadfin.
meanings.sent3: Why did the threadfin refuse to play hide and seek in the ocean? Because it always stands out in coastal waters!
meanings.sent4: The threadfin's silver scales glistened under the coastal waters' surface.
meanings.sent5: Tourists enjoy snorkeling to catch a glimpse of the colorful threadfin in the coastal waters.

meanings.definition: The threadlike rays on the fins of certain fish.
meanings.sent1: The threadfin's fins were adorned with delicate threadlike rays.
meanings.sent2: Marine biologists study the unique threadlike rays of threadfin species.
meanings.sent3: Why did the threadfin start a knitting club with other fish? To show off their threadlike fin rays!
meanings.sent4: The threadlike rays on the threadfin's fins resembled delicate strands of silk.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns created by the threadlike rays make each threadfin species distinct.
